name: Invisible (itch) (kylixlix)
description:
Overview

People continue to explore in the maze, just to collect ten memory fragments, because they know that as long as the final door is opened, the women will appear again...

Frankie is a member of the ethnic group in the city of Zobeide. Because he was fascinated by the long-haired woman who appeared in his dream, he followed the clues of memory to a maze full of mirrors. There are rumors that as long as you get out of this maze, you can meet this long-haired woman. There are no clues in this maze of mirrors, and the self in the mirror will interfere with Frankie's vision. To understand the true meaning of your dreams, the only way Frankie can find an exit is to constantly explore the way forward. Along the way, Frankie obtained fragments of memory and finally escaped the maze through numerous traps with his own strength……

This is a 3D adventure game based on a maze. The player will be born in a glass maze, all roads are unknown. And the player needs to complete different challenges while constantly exploring. These challenges can not only help the player find a way forward but also help the player obtain different memory fragments. When the player collects all the memory fragments, he or she can escape the maze.

Control

WASD to move around

Spacebar to jump

K paused the game
